original_text: But the woman became pregnant, and the next year about that same time she gave birth to a son, just as Elisha had told her.
korean_text: 여인이 과연 잉태하여 한 해가 지나 이 때쯤에 엘리사가 여인에게 말한 대로 아들을 낳았더라

sentences.original_text: and the next year about that same time
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 다음 해 그와 비슷한 시기에

sentences.original_text: she gave birth to a son
just as Elisha had told her
